content: Control-agent: Analyzed codebase - Next.js 15.3.3 app with story form (lines 426-467) that only shows alert
Planning-agent: Create comprehensive architecture plan for story storage, thank you page, and GDPR compliance
Research-agent: Investigate Next.js 15 API routes, Vercel storage options, and GDPR requirements
Backend-agent: Implement API routes for story submission and storage
Frontend-agent: Create thank you page and update form submission flow
Testing-agent: Comprehensive testing of submission flow and data handling
Documentation-agent: Document API endpoints, data flow, and GDPR compliance measures
Version-control-agent: Coordinate commits and prepare release branch
